course_description: This course serves as the capstone component for the 'Certificate of Advanced Leadership' and is open to students who seek a deeper dive on the topic of leadership. Students will conduct field research; engage with current executive organizational leaders in various settings regarding their leadership challenges and lessons learned; do extensive reading about leaders and leadership, past and present; analyze the principal themes from their self-assessment data, and develop an individualized professional development plan to carry them into the next phase of their careers.
